summary: Partners in crime Jai and Veeru set their next target on a rich businessman, Rai Bahadur. Things turn hilarious when both of them fall for his daughters.
cast: Sanjay Dutt|Govinda|Twinkle Khanna|Monica Bedi|Anupam Kher|Ashish Vidyarthi|Mukesh Rishi|Sayaji Shinde|Shakti Kapoor|Hans Raj Hans|Supriya Karnik|Pooja Batra|Rajat Bedi|Aasif Sheikh|Ajit Vachani|Anil Dhawan|Ashok Saraf|Tiku Talsania|Pramod Moutho|Mushtaq Khan|Avtar Gill|Sanjay Narvekar|Shashi Kiran|Sanjeev Siddharth|Himani Shivpuri|Kannu Gill|Master Rushabh Sheth|Aditi Desai|Siddharth Laddha|Henari Shah|Arjun|Shivaaji Satam|Babbanlal Yadav
title: Jodi No. 1
